trans-unit.source: Provides a serializable type of endpoint address that is compliant with the version of WS-Addressing published in August 2004 and that enables it to be exposed as part of the service contract.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not serializable nor is it tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification.
[!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] supplies a class that provides a serializable type, <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10>, which is WS-Addressing V1 compliant.
This class provides a WS-Addressing August 2004 compliant wrapper for the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> that is serializable and bound to a particular wire format for legacy purposes.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.FromEndpointAddress%28System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress%29> method does the wrapping and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004.ToEndpointAddress%2A> method does the unwrapping, allowing the recovery of the endpoint address after being serialized on the wire.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress10"></xref> class with a specified endpoint address.
The <xref:System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress> is not tied to a particular version of the WS-Addressing specification or bound to a particular wire format.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> used to initialize the instance of this class.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"></xref> class that contains the specified endpoint address.
Returns an XML-qualified name that describes the XML representation of the version 1 endpoint address from a specified cached schema.
This method is required by the serialization contract.
It must be public to be seen by the XmlSerializer.
It is not intended to be called by developers.
A <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema"></xref> that contains a cache of the XML schema definition language (XSD) schemas for the endpoint address.
A <xref href="System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName"></xref> that describes the XML representation of the endpoint address.
xmlSchemaSet is `null`.
Retrieves the endpoint address contained in this serializable type.
The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddress"></xref> that contains a version-neutral endpoint address of this <xref href="System.ServiceModel.EndpointAddressAugust2004"></xref>.
Returns `null`.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> from which the endpoint address is obtained.
This member supports the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> to which the current endpoint address is saved.
